articles.title: Meta and Microsoft say they will buy AMD's new AI chip as an alternative to Nvidia's - CNBC
articles.description: AMD's newest AI chip, the Instinct MI300X, could give big tech buyers leverage over Nvidia, if it works as advertised and is price-competitive.
articles.content: Meta, OpenAI, and Microsoft said at an AMD investor event Wednesday they will use AMD's newest AI chip, the Instinct MI300X. It's the biggest sign so far that technology companies are searching for a… [+3523 chars]

articles.title: Another technology milestone achieved: PM Modi on Chandrayaan-3 feat - Times of India - IndiaTimes
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi lauded a significant achievement in India's space exploration efforts as the Propulsion Module of Chandrayaan-.

articles.title: Self-assembled photonic cavities with atomic-scale confinement - Nature.com
articles.description: Silicon photonic nanocavities based on surface forces and conventional lithography and etching are developed, demonstrating pioneering technology that integrates atomic dimensions with the scalability of planar semiconductors.

articles.title: Bridge-sized asteroid to come as close as 5.5mn km to Earth, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: A Near-Earth Asteroid which is bigger than the Empire State Building is predicted to pass Earth closely today, December 6. Know the asteroid’s speed, distance of approach, size, and other details, as per NASA.
